title: Bound
description: Sixteen year old Arelia LaRue lives in New Orleans where the music is loud, voodoo queens inhabit every street corner, and the ghosts are alive and well. Despite her surroundings, all she wants is to help her Grand-mere Bea pay the rent and save up for college. When her best friend Sabrina convinces her to take a well-paying summer job at the infamous Darkwood plantation, owned by the wealthy LaPlante family, Arelia agrees. However, at Darkwood nothing is what is seems. Arelia enters a world full of tricky spirits, strange characters and forbidden love. In the intoxicating world of New Orleans Hoodoo/Voodoo expect the unexpected! Come along for the ride... author: Kira Saito
